columns.Party_ID: The unique identifier for each party.
columns.Party_Theme: The theme associated with the party.
columns.Location: The venue where the party is held.
columns.First_year: The first year the party was organized.
columns.Last_year: The last year the party took place.
columns.Number_of_hosts: The total number of hosts for the party.

party.table_description: The table records details of various parties hosted.

columns.Host_ID: The unique identifier for each host.
columns.Name: The full name of the host.
columns.Nationality: The country of citizenship of the host.
columns.Age: The age of the host in years.

host.table_description: The table stores information about various party hosts.

columns.Party_ID: The unique identifier for each party hosted.
columns.Host_ID: The unique identifier for each host involved.
columns.Is_Main_in_Charge: The indicator of whether the host is the main organizer.

party_host.table_description: The table associates hosts with their respective parties.
